title: League of legends won't open
body: I click on League, and then nothing happens except for a blue circle next to the mouse clicker shows up for a few seconds.

replies.body: Possibly try running it under administrator as well if nothing else is working.

It sounds like some setting might be preventing the patcher from launching.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Go to task manager

Click on the processor tab

Find the league client process

Click on it and end the process

Now launch it and it should work
